src:
Jadwal Liga 1 Selasa dan Klasemen: Borneo FC Vs Badak Lampung
04 Nov 2019, 22:43 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jadwal Liga 1 pekan ke-27 Selasa, 5 November 2019, akan menyajikan satu laga, yakni Borneo FC vs Perseru Badak Lampung FC. Pertandingan yang giglar di Stadion Segiri, Samarinda, Kalimantan Timur, itu akan berlangsung mulai 18.30 WIB dan disiarkan O Channel.
Borneo FC kini berada di posisi keempat klasemen dengan poin 41, atau selisih 14 poin dengan pimpinan klasemen Bali United. Badak Lampung menghuni posisi ke-15 klasemen dengan nilai 26, hanya unggul dua poin dari Persela yang ada di zona degradasi.
Pelatih Borneo FC, Mario Gomez, mengingatkan para pemainnya untuk waspada terhadap kebangkitan Badak Lampung. "Mereka punya penyerang yang bagus, dan ada Bojan di lini belakang, yang tangguh dalam bertahan, pastinya anak-anak harus bekerja keras untuk mencapai hasil maksimal," kata dia seperti dikutip Antara, Senin.
Gomez melihat, saat ini posisi Perseru dalam zona kurang aman, sehingga lebih termotivasi untuk mendapatkan hasil dalam setiap laga yang dilakoni. "Kami baru menuai kekalahan di Banjarmasin hadapi Barito, kami tidak mau kejadian tersebut terulang, saat ini kami bertindak sebagai tuan rumah, sehingga tiga poin wajib didapatkan," kata dia.
Pelatih Perseru Badak Lampung, Milan Petrovic. akan menerapkan strategi memperketat lini pertahanan dalam laga nanti. Meski berat, pelatih asal Slovenia tersebut berharap para pemainnya tampil enjoy sehingga taktik dan strategi bisa berjalan maksimal.
"Kami tahu bahwa Borneo merupakan tim luar biasa, karena mereka berhasil mengalahkan pimpinan klasemen Bali United dengan skor telak 6-0, siapapun tim yang akan berlaga di Samarinda tentu akan merasakan tekanan seperti ini, tapi kami akan berjuang maksimal, minimal kami bisa mencuri satu poin," kata dia.

text:
League 1 Schedule Tuesday and Standings: Borneo FC Vs Badak Lampung
Nov. 04 2019, 22:43 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - League Schedule 1 of Week 27 Tuesday, 5 November 2019, will present one match, namely Borneo FC vs Perseru Badak Lampung FC. The giglar match at Segiri Stadium, Samarinda, East Kalimantan, will take place starting at 18:30 WIB and broadcast on O Channel.
Borneo FC is now in fourth position on the standings with 41 points, or a difference of 14 points with league leaders Bali United. Lampung Rhinos occupy the 15th position of the standings with a value of 26, only two points ahead of Persela in the relegation zone.
Borneo FC coach Mario Gomez reminded his players to be wary of the revival of the Lampung rhino. "They have good attackers, and there is Bojan at the back, who is strong in defense, certainly children must work hard to achieve maximum results," he said as quoted by Antara on Monday.
Gomez saw, at this time Perseru's position in the zone was less safe, so that he was more motivated to get results in every action he played. "We have just reaped defeat in Banjarmasin against Barito, we do not want the incident to be repeated, at this time we are acting as the host, so three points must be obtained," he said.
Lampung Rhino Perseru coach, Milan Petrovic. will implement a strategy to tighten the defense in the game later. Although heavy, the Slovenian coach hopes his players will enjoy so that tactics and strategy can run optimally.
"We know that Borneo is an extraordinary team, because they managed to beat the leaders of Bali United with a landslide score of 6-0, whoever will compete in Samarinda will surely feel the pressure like this, but we will fight optimally, at least we can steal one points, "he said.
League 1 Schedule
Tuesday, November 5 2019 Bristol FC vs Rhinoceros Lampung | 18:30 WIB (Ochannel)
Wednesday, November 6 2019 PSS Sleman vs Bali United | 15:30 WIB (Indosiar) PSM Makassar vs Central Kalimantan Putra | 15:30 WIB (Ochannel) Persib vs PSIS Semarang | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Thursday, November 7, 2019 Persipura vs Bhayangkara | 15:30 WIB Semen Padang vs Persija | 16:00 WIB (Indosiar)
Friday, November 8, 2019Arema FC vs Madura United | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Saturday, November 9, 2019 Persikabo vs Persebaya | 18:30 WIB (Indosiar)
Week 27 results - Inter vs Barito Putera 0-0.
